name: Hell Prison Escape
description: Hell Prison Escape is a great thinking and mystery-solving game, with a touch of humour too! The goal here is to kill the monster and escape prison. You will have to use your intellect on this one. You need to be resourceful to escape too and look out for details. Grab the items lying around and combine some of them or use them on objects. Just be observant, patient and take your time, and you'll solve the mystery! A must-play! Have Fun!
